vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'H3440H', 'matchingForm': 'יִשְׁוִי', 'stepTransliteration': 'yish.vi', 'gloss': 'Ishvi', '_searchResultRange': '1Sam.14.49@1Sam.14.49-1Chr.10.2', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '亦施韋', '_es_Gloss': 'Isui', '_zh_Gloss': '亦施韦'}, {'strongNumber': 'H3441', 'matchingForm': 'יִשְׁוִי', 'stepTransliteration': 'yish.vi', 'gloss': 'Ishvite', '_searchResultRange': 'Num.26.44@Gen.46.17-1Chr.7.30', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '亦施韋族', '_es_Gloss': 'Issui', '_zh_Gloss': '亦施韦族'}]
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Asher living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Gen.46.17;
son of: Asher (H0836);
brother of: Imnah (H3232), Ishvah (H3438), Beriah (H1283) and Serah (H8294)
Also named: yish.vi (יִשְׁוִי "Ishvite" H3441)
§ Ishui or Ishuai or Isui or Jesui = "he resembles me"
1) the 2nd son of Saul by his wife Ahinoam
2) the 3rd son of Asher and founder of the family of Ishuaites
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Aser; (b)   hijo del rey Saúl; (c)   descendiente de Isví, hijo de Aser
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亦施韋 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "他像我一樣"
1) 掃羅王的次子, 為亞希暖所生 (撒上 14:49)
2) 亞設的第三個兒子, 亦施韋家族的建立者 (創 46:17;民 26:44;代上 7:30)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亦施韦 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "他像我一样"
1) 扫罗王的次子, 为亚希暖所生 (撒上 14:49)
2) 亚设的第三个儿子, 亦施韦家族的建立者 (创 46:17;民 26:44;代上 7:30)

vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'H0041G', 'matchingForm': 'אֲבִינָדָב', 'stepTransliteration': 'a.vi.na.dav', 'gloss': 'Abinadab', '_searchResultRange': '1Sam.7.1-1Chr.13.7', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '亞比拿達', '_es_Gloss': 'Abinadab', '_zh_Gloss': '亚比拿达'}, {'strongNumber': 'H0041H', 'matchingForm': 'אֲבִינָדָב', 'stepTransliteration': 'a.vi.na.dav', 'gloss': 'Abinadab', '_searchResultRange': '1Sam.31.2-1Chr.10.2@1Sam.14.49-1Chr.10.2', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '亞比拿達', '_es_Gloss': 'Abinadab', '_zh_Gloss': '亚比拿达'}, {'strongNumber': 'H0041I', 'matchingForm': 'אֲבִינָדָב', 'stepTransliteration': 'a.vi.na.dav', 'gloss': 'Abinadab', '_searchResultRange': '1Sam.16.8-1Chr.2.13', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '亞比拿達', '_es_Gloss': 'Abinadab', '_zh_Gloss': '亚比拿达'}, {'strongNumber': 'H3440G', 'matchingForm': 'יִשְׁוִי', 'stepTransliteration': 'yish.vi', 'gloss': 'Ishvi', '_searchResultRange': 'Gen.46.17-1Chr.7.30', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '亦施韋', '_es_Gloss': 'Isui', '_zh_Gloss': '亦施韦'}]
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.14.49;
son of: Saul (H7586G) and Ahinoam (H0293);
brother of: Jonathan (H3083H), Malchi-shua (H4444), Merab (H4764) and Michal (H4324);
half-brother of: Ish-bosheth (H0378), Armoni (H0764) and Mephibosheth (H4648H); also called Ishvi (KJV: Ishui) at 1Sa.14.49;
Another name of a.vi.na.dav (אֲבִינָדָב "Abinadab" H0041H)
§ Ishui or Ishuai or Isui or Jesui = "he resembles me"
1) the 2nd son of Saul by his wife Ahinoam
2) the 3rd son of Asher and founder of the family of Ishuaites
